name: The IPaintMyMind Print Project : "Animal Pharm" by SONNY KAY - Limited Edition of 10
description:
$25 OFF FOR A LIMITED TIME! 

"Animal Pharm" by SONNY KAY for The IPaintMyMind Print Project

PRINT SPECS:
Limited Edition of 10, printed by STATIC MEDIUM on Museo Portfolio Rag with Epson UltraChrome HDR inks.

SIGNED & NUMBERED by SONNY KAY
 
Print size: 26"x26" / Image size: 24"x24"

name: IPaintMyMind Print Series: The Prometheus Tree by Vidhya Nagarajan
description:
We’re thrilled to announce the release of #2 in IPaintMyMind Print Series. Sonny Kay kicked it off at the beginning of 2012 with “Animal Pharm,” and we couldn’t be happier to keep it movin’. Vidhya Nagarajan is a friend, and was previously featured on IPMM. Her foodie map of Chicago got attention locally, and her illustration has graced various pages, including those of Sauce Magazine (STL).

Here’s a little back story on “The Prometheus Tree” from Vidhya herself:

“In 1964 a scientist was doing climate change research. He wanted to study the width between tree rings to see the temperature at  different times in history. He had ordered a special drill to take a core sample of a gnarled, old Great Basin Bristlecone Pine tree. He began twisting the drill into the tree, but it became too difficult to turn. Finally, the drill broke into the tree. The drill was a special order item, and the scientist needed it to finish his research.  He found a district ranger nearby and the ranger tells him not to worry, “we’ll just cut down the tree.” He takes a big slab of the tree home and counts over 4, 800 rings. He learns that he had cut down the oldest living organism in the world.

This story was heard on an episode of WNYC Radiolab about a year ago and has been on my mind ever since.  I  cringe every time I think about all of the people and events the Prometheus Tree outlived only to be cut down in a short time.”

18 X 24
SIGNED & NUMBERED BY THE ARTIST

YELLOW - Edition of 20
GREEN - Edition of 10
BROWN - Edition of 10

name: IPaintMyMind Mandala Logo + Text Print - Limited Edition of 25
description:
We're so thrilled with our NEW logo art by Iain Macarthur. Show everyone your support for IPMM and our collaboration-based media model with this iconic print.

Limited Edition of 25.

Original IPMM Logo Art by Iain Macarthur (LONDON, UK)
http://iainmacarthur.carbonmade.com/

Printed by Steve Walters of Screwball Press (CHICAGO, IL, USA)
http://screwballpress.com

18x24 in.

FREE SHIPPING!!

name: IPMM Text Sticker Pack (3)
description:
Sticker pack includes THREE (3) IPMM stickers. 

Original Art by Iain Macarthur, and we couldn't be happier with it. Show your support for IPMM and reclaim some public space while you do it!!

BACK IN-STOCK!

18 X 24

YELLOW - Edition of 20
GREEN - Edition of 10
BROWN - Edition of 10

THIS IS THE FULL SET OF 3, WHICH SAVES YOU $10! YOU'LL ALSO RECEIVE AN IPMM MANDALA LOGO PRINT FOR FREE AS A THANK YOU FROM IPAINTMYMIND!
